Dark Reaping.name: Dark Reaping
Dark Reaping.flavor: You use one death as the seed to sow more destruction.
Dark Reaping.trigger: A creature within 5 squares of you is reduced to 0 hit points
Dark Reaping.effect: One creature of your choice that you hit with an attack before the end of your next turn takes extra necrotic damage equal to 1d8 + your Constitution modifier or Charisma modifier.
